channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Taylor Swift’s ‘The Fate of Ophelia’ Video Is Finally Up on YouTube: Watch
item.description: 🎉 Taylor Swift brings 'The Fate of Ophelia' to life in her new video! 🎬 Hit play now on YouTube and prepare to be mesmerized! 🌟 #TaylorSwift #NewMusicVideo

item.title: Paul McCartney Literally and Figuratively Duets with the Past on the “Got Back Tour”: Review
item.description: 🎸 Paul McCartney's "Got Back Tour" is a time machine of hits and memories! Read all about his mesmerizing duets with the past 🕰️ #PaulMcCartney #GotBackTour

item.title: Doja Cat Performs ‘Gorgeous’ & ‘Aaahh Men!’ From ‘Vie’ Album on ‘SNL’: Watch
item.description: 🎶 Doja Cat slays ‘Vie’ tracks on SNL! 🎤 Watch her bring the heat with ‘Gorgeous’ & ‘Aaahh Men!’ 🔥 #DojaCat #SNL #Vie

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Returns to No. 1 on Billboard 200 Albums Chart
item.description: 🎉 Unstoppable! 'KPop Demon Hunters' reclaims the throne on the Billboard 200 Albums Chart! 🎶🔥 #KPopRoyalty #ChartToppers

item.title: See Sabrina Carpenter Bring Out Shania Twain at Austin City Limits Festival
item.description: Who knew we needed this collab?! 🌟 Sabrina Carpenter + Shania Twain = EPIC at Austin City Limits! 🎶 #MusicMagic
